name: RPG Audio - fantasy music and sound effects for board games
name_original: RPG Audio - fantasy music and sound effects for board games
description:
An indispensable assistant to the game master. RPG Audio will help when playing D&D and other role-playing games and will also become an excellent background soundtrack.

You can play, engage in creative pursuits, read, simply relax with the theme background music which sets up the right mood and creates a lively atmosphere.

- Make your game truly realistic and ambient
- You do not need to search and assemble sounds yourself.
- You will be able to select the desired theme for every occasion
- RPG Audio on iPhone or iPad is always with you

Advantages

- A large selection of sounds
- Easy to use
- High sound quality
- Ability to combine different sounds
- No ads
- Broadcasting sounds from parallel worlds
